name: Heavyweight Legends
description:
This is a boxing fangame based on the franchise, "Fight Night" created by EA Sports. I just wanted to make a boxing game for myself. This game is supposed to bring a experience from a 2.5D perspective that costs money to a 2D perspective that's free. Its supposed to emulate real life boxing (ex. stamina matters, counters).

To pick players, P1 clicks first on the fighter image they want to play as. After P1 chooses, P2 chooses.

P1 Controls:

Key A = Move Left

Key D = Move Right

Key W + Key A/D = Head Movement

Key E + Key F = Block Head

Key E + V = Block Body

Key F = Head Jab

Key S + Key F = Body Jab

Key F + C/B (depends on where your facing) = Head Straight

Key C/B = Head Hooks

Key S + Key C/B = Body Hooks

Key C/B + Key V = Head Uppercuts

Key C/B + Key V + Key S = Body Uppercuts

Key Q = Power Buffer (use with any of the attack buttons to perform a stronger attack for the cost of stamina)

Key 1 + Key 2 = Clinch

P2 Controls:

Key Left Arrow = Move Left

Key Right Arrow = Move Right

Key Up Arrow + Key Left/Right Arrow = Head Movement

Key U + Key I = Block Head

Key U + Key K = Block Body

Key I = Head Jab

Key Down Arrow + Key I = Body Jab

Key I + Key J/L (depends on where your facing) = Head Straight

Key J/L = Head Hooks

Key S + Key J/L = Body Hooks

Key J/L + Key K = Head Uppercuts

Key S + Key J/L + Key K = Body Uppercuts

Key P = Power Buffer (use with any of the attack buttons to perform a stronger attack for the cost of stamina)

Key 0 + Key 9 = Clinch

All boxer sprites made by me. Nintendo made the background.
